keywords.value: Carbon Caps and Emissions Trading Programs
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced a plan to reduce carbon emissions that relies on fossil fuel taxes and cap-and-trade systems of emission allowances.
snippet: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced a plan to reduce carbon emissions that relies on fossil fuel taxes and cap-and-trade systems of emission allowances....

headline.main: Canada Strikes a Deal to Cut Carbon Emissions by Putting a Price on Them
